content.content:
`.products`

Use the **products** resource to create, read, update and delete items for sale in
a merchant's store, you can edit all product properties and also work with all
product subresources directly at this resource, such as product images, variations, brands and categories

meta.description: IDs from other stores authorized to sell this product - Max elements: **1000**
Store ID
Product unique reference code - Min length: **2** - Max length: **100** - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Za-z0-9-_.]+$`**
Product type
Product full name - Max length: **255**
Product name translations - Max properties: **10**
Translated full product name - Max length: **255**
Optional subtitle intended to be used for SEO or layout purposes - Max length: **255**
Slug to complete page URL, starting with number or lowercase letter - Max length: **255** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9]([a-z0-9-_./]+)?$`**
Permanent URL to product page - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Optional URL specific to mobile devices - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Status defined by seller, such as draft or live - Max length: **50**
True when product is complete registered and ready to sell
Visible on search results, collections and catalogs
Number to define the importance of the ad, the higher should be displayed first - Mininum: **-128** - Maximum: **127**
Option ad type defined by seller, such as gold and silver - Max length: **50**
Short product description in plain text - Max length: **255**
Full product description, may use HTML tags - Max length: **500000**
Full product description, plain text only - Max length: **500000**
Title tag for page SEO - Max length: **255**
Meta description tag for page SEO - Max length: **1000**
Tags related with product for internal search - Max elements: **200**
Term (keyword)
Product sale price, when undefined, product could be bought by any price - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999**
How long sale price is valid, out of this range (if defined), `base_price` should be applied
Start date and time in ISO 8601 standard representation - Format: **date-time**
Promotion end date and time in ISO 8601 standard representation - Format: **date-time**
Product original sale price, without discounts - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999**
Product cost price to calculate profit - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999999**
Designator of currency according to ISO 4217 (3 uppercase letters) - RegEx pattern: **`^[A-Z]{3}$`**
Graphic symbol used as a shorthand for currency's name - Max length: **20**
Product quantity available to sell, max to put in cart - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999**
Minimum quantity to put in cart - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999**
Deadline for production or handling of pre-ordered product
Number of days to post the product after purchase, deadline for production or handling - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **99999**
If the deadline is calculated in working days
If the production time is cumulative per product unit
When cumulative, increase the term proportionally up to this maximum (in days) - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **99999**
Decrease product available quantity automatically after each order
Recent stock history - Max elements: **180**
Unique ID (ObjectID) - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Date and time when stock changed in ISO 8601 standard representation - Format: **date-time**
Optional note about origin or reason of stock changing - Max length: **50**
Added or decreased (negative) stock quantity - Mininum: **-9999999** - Maximum: **9999999**
Measure and dimension of your product when users might be interested in price per unit
Unit of measurement
Maximum number of decimal places in the product quantity (in unit of measure) - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **4**
Quantity to calculate the price to be shown on ads, such as GMC `unit_pricing_base_measure` - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **9999999**
Indicate that this item is a group of multiple identical products - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999**
Product dimensions with packaging for freight calculation
Package width, height and length
Size in specified unit - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999**
Unit of measurement
Package weight for freight calculation
Size in specified unit - Mininum: **0** - Maximum: **999999**
Unit of measurement
Item condition
Product restricted to adults (`18+`)
Warranty time and conditions - Max length: **100**
List of product brands - Max elements: **100**
Brand ID - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**
Brand name - Max length: **255**
Brand page slug - Max length: **255** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9]([a-z0-9-_./]+)?$`**
Brand logo
Image link - Max length: **255** - Format: **uri**
Image size (width x height) in px, such as 100x50 (100px width, 50px height) - Max length: **11** - RegEx pattern: **`^[1-9]([0-9]+)?x[1-9]([0-9]+)?$`**
Alternative text, HTML alt tag (important for SEO) - Max length: **255**
List of product categories - Max elements: **100**
Category ID - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-f0-9]{24}$`**

ID in Mercado Libre Taxonomy - RegEx pattern: **`^ML[A-Z][0-9]{2,9}$`**
ID in Google Taxonomy - Mininum: **1** - Maximum: **999999999999**
Products main category tree, separating by >, such as Women > Dresses - Max length: **750**

If this field is related to a grid, put the `grid_id` - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9_]{2,30}$`**
If field is required (true), customer must always choose a value

Default (to all options) price alteration if customer use this field
Type of price addition

content.content:
*/products.json?sku* > Authentication
_GET_: **none** Pagination is not available, the unique possible filter is by `sku` Returns only `_id` and `sku` of each product

meta.description: The product SKU
meta.title: string

content.content:
*/products.json* > Authentication
_POST_: **required** Request body must obey the specifications of [this model](#reference/products/product-object)

*/products/[_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_: **optional**
_PATCH_, _PUT_, _DELETE_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/products/product-object), requests without authentication will receive product data without `hidden_metafields` property For overwriting and editing, request body must obey the same specifications, but especially for edit requests there are no required fields

meta.description: The product ID
meta.title: string
